Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I'm a fresh forum user, but I have a little experience from demo and now in 0.16. Sucesfull mission to Mun with return to Kerbin, and not so good "one-way" trip to the Minmus (horizontal speed and fall, feed up a engine). Yesterday I was trying to dock but I'm flustrated with RCS, something I was made wrong and only made a cillision.

During few last days I'm digging for some usefull tools, plugins, parts and guides. It's a mine of knowledge! That not be easy to found stuff for me.

Welcome to the forums ri00t.

My favorite mods are: ISA Mapsat and all parts in the Mechanical Mouse Industries pack

(and everything these packs include to work)

Edited August 27, 2012 by dt890

For now I searching for moonbase mods and handy trajectory information (angle, speed, Ap&Pe altitude) so you hit the jackpot! Thanks a lot. Both looks pretty cool.

Next target is electrical mods like Ion engine from Deep Space Mission Pack with spread solar panels (maybe Ion RCS if available).

Last planned step is space station, I need a LOT of practice to docking first and RCS use. Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau looks interesting.

I keep trying to find review of mods with different purpose. I'm open to sugestions.

Trying to meet two pods on the Mun. Results after two relanding:

1)

0*23'20"N

143*54'7"E

2)

0*7'10"N

143*26'20"E

EDIT:

That was not so easy what I'm imagine. ^^

Edited August 28, 2012 by ri00t
